testcase.name: Footer Component > should render the footer
Footer Component > should render copyright text
Footer Component > should render social media links
Authorized Emails Service > addAuthorizedEmail > should add an email to authorized list
Authorized Emails Service > addAuthorizedEmail > should handle errors when adding email
Authorized Emails Service > removeAuthorizedEmail > should remove an email from authorized list
Authorized Emails Service > removeAuthorizedEmail > should handle errors when removing email
Authorized Emails Service > getAuthorizedEmails > should return list of authorized emails
Authorized Emails Service > getAuthorizedEmails > should return empty array when no emails found
Authorized Emails Service > isEmailAuthorized > should return true for authorized email
Authorized Emails Service > isEmailAuthorized > should return false for unauthorized email
